alertDescription.value: the number of unavailable replicas as a % of Total

query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_deployment_status_replicas_available' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend deployment = tostring(Json.deployment) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_deployment_status_replicas' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend deployment = tostring(Json.deployment) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Total=Val, deployment, namespace) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, deployment, namespace | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Available=Val, Total, Pct = (Val / Total) * 100, deployment, namespace
